19681.en:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Oi, Medde, do you remember where that old
village census thing is?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19681.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「おおーい　メーデ。村人名簿の古いやつを
　どこに　しまったか　覚えておるか？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19681.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 메데. 오래된 주민 명부를
　어디 뒀는지 기억해?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19681.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>喂，美典，你还记得我把那本旧的
村民名册放到哪里了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19681.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>喂，美黛，妳還記得我把那本舊的
村民名冊放到哪裡嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19682.en:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>Ah? Didn't we throw the ones that were
over 50 years old out a long time ago?<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19682.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>「あら？　５０年以上前の　古いものは
　だいぶ前に　捨てませんでしたー？<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19682.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>: 어머? 50년 넘은 오래된 장부는
　오래전에 버리지 않았어요?<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19682.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>咦？都是５０年前的老东西了，
早就扔掉了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19682.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>咦？都是５０年前的老東西了，
早就扔掉了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19683.en:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>That's right! I forgot that I sent that
Hyuza guy to throw them out.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19683.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「そうだった！　ヒューザのやつに
　捨てにいかせたのを　忘れとったぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19683.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 맞아, 그랬지! 휴자 녀석에게
　버리라고 한 걸 깜빡했군.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19683.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>对了！是我吩咐修萨扔掉的。
我自己都差点忘了。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19683.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>對喔！我都忘了，
是我叫修扎拿去扔掉的。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19684.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Hmmm... The clue to this case was buried in
secret by the Chief. And yet, the Chief
doesn't seem like a criminal...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19684.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「ふむ……。この事件の手がかりは
　村長により　闇に葬られようとしていた。
　さりとて　村長が犯人とは　思えない……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19684.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 흠……. 촌장이
　이 사건의 단서를 영영 묻어 버리려 했군.
　하지만 그렇다고 촌장이 범인 같진 않아…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19684.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>哦……村长试图将事件的线索
埋藏到黑暗中。
即便如此我也不认为村长就是犯人……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19684.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>嗯……村長試圖將事件的線索
暗中處理掉。
但即便如此，我也不認為村長就是犯人……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19685.en: <start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Oh, Rubecca. Playing detective, are you?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19685.ja: <start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「おお　ルベカちゃん。探偵ごっこかね。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19685.ko: <start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 오오, 루베카. 탐정놀이 중이냐?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19685.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，露贝卡。你在玩侦探游戏呐。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19685.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>喔喔，露貝卡。妳在玩偵探遊戲啊。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19686.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Dad... Chief Setorii, will you tell me where
you dumped that village census?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19686.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「お父さ……セトリー村長。
　その村人名簿を　どこに捨てたのかを
　この私に　教えてくれるかね？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19686.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 아빠…… 세트리 촌장.
　그 주민 명부를 어디에 버렸는지
　알려 주지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19686.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>老爸……赛特力村长，
能告诉我那本村民名册
被扔到哪儿了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19686.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>老爸……賽特力村長，
能告訴我那本村民名冊
被扔到哪兒了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19687.en:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hmmm. If I recall, Hyuza told me he threw
it out on his way to the Forgotten Cave
in Leenam Fields.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19687.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「う～ん。たしか　ヒューザが
　レーナム緑野にある　忘却のほら穴に
　出かけるときに　ついでに捨てろと……。<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19687.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>: 음~ 분명히 휴자가
　레남 녹지에 있는 망각의 동굴에 간다기에
　겸사겸사 버려달라고 했던 것 같은데…….<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19687.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，应该是……
修萨去雷纳姆绿洲的遗忘洞窟时，
我吩咐他顺便扔掉的……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19687.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>嗯，記得是修扎
去雷納姆綠野的遺忘洞穴時，
我叫他順道扔的……<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19688.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>...Hmmm, I see. So that's how it is.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19688.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「……う～む　なるほど。
　そういうことか。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19688.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: ……흠~ 그렇군.
　그런 거였나.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19688.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>……嗯，原来如此。
我明白了。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19688.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>……嗯，原來如此。
是這麼回事啊。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19689.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I'll take that as the truth!!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19689.ja: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「この真実　いただきます！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19689.ko: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 이 진실, 포착했습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19689.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>事件的真相，在我手中！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19689.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>事件的真相，在我手中！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19690.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>My guess is that Hyuza, who is surprisingly
sincere, definitely dumped the village
census in the cave as he was told to do!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19690.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「私の推理によれば　意外と律儀なヒューザは
　言われたとおり　その洞くつに
　村人名簿を捨てたと見て　まちがいない！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19690.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 내 추리로는 휴자는
　은근히 고지식하니 하라는 대로 그 동굴에
　주민 명부를 버렸을 게 분명해!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19690.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>根据我的推理，
性格严谨的修萨遵照吩咐将村民名册
扔到了洞穴里。肯定没错！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19690.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>根據我的推理，
性格嚴謹的修扎肯定是遵照吩咐
將村民名冊扔到了洞穴！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19691.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Did you hear that, <pc>? The lead in
the Dahlia case lies in the cave, waiting
to be discovered!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19691.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「聞いていたかね　<pc>くん。
　ダーリア事件の　重要な手がかりが
　洞くつの中に眠っていると　わかったぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19691.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 들었나, <pc>?
　달리아 사건의 중요한 단서가
　동굴 안에 잠들어 있다는 게 밝혀졌네!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19691.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low><pc>，你也听到了吧。
达利娅案件的重要线索
还沉睡在洞穴中呢！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19691.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low><pc>，你也聽到了吧。
妲莉亞事件的重要線索
還沉睡在洞穴中呢！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19692.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>From here on, it's up to you. I'm the
brains, and you're the brawn. It's the
most efficient method.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19692.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「ここからは　助手の仕事だ。
　アタマを使うのは私。肉体労働はキミが担当。
　これが　もっとも効率的な　やり方さ。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19692.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 이제부터는 조수가 활약해 줘야겠어.
　머리를 쓰는 건 나, 육체 노동은 자네 담당.
　이게 가장 효율적인 방법이니까.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19692.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>接下来就轮到助手出场了。
我负责动脑子，你负责体力劳动，
这样的配合才最有效率。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19692.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>接下來就輪到助手出場了。
我負責動腦子，你負責體力勞動，
這樣的配合才最有效率。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19693.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>I'll wait here. You go check out the inside
of Forgotten Cave in Leenam Fields.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19693.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「私は　ここで待っている。
　レーナム緑野にある　忘却のほら穴を
　奥の奥まで　調べてきてくれたまえ。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19693.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 난 여기서 기다리고 있겠네.
　레남 녹지에 있는 망각의 동굴을
　구석구석 조사하고 와 주게.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19693.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>你就去雷纳姆绿洲把遗忘洞窟
彻底调查一番吧。
我在这里等你回来。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19693.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>我在這裡等你。
你去雷納姆綠野把遺忘洞穴
徹底調查一番吧。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19694.en:
It looks like a monster has dug something
out of the ground.
19694.ja: 魔物が　地面から　何かを掘りだしたようだ。
19694.ko: 마물이 바닥에서 무언가를 파낸 것 같다.
19694.zh-Hans: 怪物似乎从地面挖出了什么东西。
19694.zh-Hant: 怪物似乎從地面挖出了什麼東西。

19695.ja: <start_lip_sync m04200 _normal m00001>「キキィキー！<stop_lip_animation m04200 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19696.ja: <start_lip_sync m04200 _normal m00001>「キキィキー！<stop_lip_animation m04200 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19697.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Let's see... Hmm. I see, I see...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19697.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>「どれどれ……。ふむ。
　なるほど　なるほど……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19697.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>: 어디 보자……. 흠.
　오호라, 그렇군…….<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19697.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>让我看看……嗯。
这样啊，原来如此……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19697.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>我看看……嗯。
這樣啊，原來如此……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19698.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I found Dahlia's name! And her groom, Reg,
next to it too.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19698.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ダーリアさんの名前を　見つけた！
　花婿のレグさんも　いっしょに載ってるわ。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19698.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 달리아 씨의 이름을 찾았어!
　신랑인 레구 씨의 이름도 같이 실려 있어.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19698.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>上面有达利娅的名字！
旁边还有新郎莱格的名字。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19698.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>上面有妲莉亞小姐的名字！
旁邊還有新郎雷格先生的名字。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19699.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>It shows they were husband and wife.
In other words, this census, undoubtedly,
must've been made just before the wedding.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19699.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ふたりの関係は　夫婦って書かれてる。
　つまりこれは　結婚式の直前に作られた
　名簿ってことで　まちがいなさそうよ。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19699.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 두 사람의 관계는 부부라고 적혀 있어.
　즉, 이건 결혼식 직전에 작성된
　명부인 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19699.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>上面写着两个人是夫妻关系。
也就是说，这个名册是在婚礼前不久制作的。
应该没有错。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19699.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>上面寫著兩個人是夫妻關係。
也就是說，這個名冊是在婚禮前不久製作的，
應該沒有錯。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19701.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>This looks recent. One person's name
appears to have been erased.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19701.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ほら　ここんとこ。
　ひとりだけ　名前が消されてるみたい。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19701.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 여기 좀 봐.
　한 명만 이름이 지워졌어.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19701.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>快看，这里。
有个名字被抹去了。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19701.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>快看，這裡。
好像有個名字被抹去了。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19702.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Everything but the name is still here.
Let me see... Gender... Female and her age...
Is 10 years old.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19702.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「名前の他は　残ってるね。えっと……。
　性別は……女で　年齢は……１０歳。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19702.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 이름 외의 정보는 남아 있네…….
　성별은…… 여자고, 나이는…… 10살.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19702.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>但除名字之外的信息还保留着。嗯……
性别……女，年龄……１０岁。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19702.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>名字以外的資訊都還留著。嗯……
性別……女，年齡……１０歲。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19703.en: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>A 10 year old girl...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19703.ja: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「１０歳の女の子……。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19703.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>１０岁的女孩子……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19703.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>１０歲的女孩……<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19705.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Ahh, sorry for spacing out. Th...Thanks to
you, I think an important clue was found.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19705.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「あっ　ぼーっとして　ごめんね。
　お……おかげで　重要な手がかりが
　見つかったみたいよ。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19705.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>: 앗, 멍하니 있어서 미안해.
　더…… 덕분에 중요한 단서를
　찾은 것 같아.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19705.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>啊，想得出神了，不好意思。
多亏了你，
我们似乎找到了很重要的线索。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19705.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>啊，抱歉，想得出神了。
多……多虧了你，
我們似乎找到了很重要的線索。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19706.en:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>But we'll continue this another time.
That's all for today!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「でも　この続きは　また今度にしたいの。

19706.ko:

19706.zh-Hans:

今天就到这里。<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

今天就先到這裡！<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

Can I give you this as thanks?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
